summary: Accomplished leader in customer success management, leveraging extensive experience in operations and technical integration within SaaS environments to drive customer retention and success. Skilled in deploying data-driven strategies, fostering strong customer relationships, and leading high-performance teams in dynamic settings.
skills: Project Management (Jira, Asana, Trello, Monday, Notion)

experience.description: Spearheaded initiatives leading to significant improvements in customer retention and satisfaction through the introduction of technology-driven solutions. Led and mentored a team of customer success managers, instilling a culture of high performance and continuous development. Developed and executed a comprehensive customer success strategy, integrating machine learning and AI for automation and predictive analysis within customer engagement processes. Enhanced data-driven decision-making across customer success, sales, and marketing teams, consistently meeting strategic goals and performance targets.

Managed and maintained 90% client retention through proactive customer engagements and strategic account management. Mastered the art of implementing scaled customer success strategies supporting multiple product lines and customer objectives in talent acquisition. Acted as a key escalation point, resolving complex issues effectively to prevent churn and improve customer lifecycle engagement.

Excelled in driving sales growth and customer acquisition for SaaS-based security solutions, facilitating organization scale in a highly dynamic tech environment. Demonstrated strong leadership in team expansions and training, pivotal in developing customer-centric sales strategies.
Led sales and onboarding processes focusing on high conversion rates and strategic partner management, laying a solid foundation for robust customer support and engagement strategies.
